name: Guardian Athena
description:
Guarding Athena is an easy-to-play guard game, which requires your wisdom to challenge success.

Features：
1. Play as the Swordman, Mage or Bowmaster. Defend against 50 waves of monsters and powerful bosses.
2. Three difficulty levels included the Normal, Hard and Extreme to challenge yourself.
3. Game can be autosaved making you continue to play anytime. No concern for limited spare time.
4. Various interesting contents waiting for you. You can improve yourself by upgrading items, hiring powerful mercenaries, or buying tomes of knowledge.
5. Defeat the enemies strategically not simply violently.

Contact us : rangergame@163.com
